quote: That's sounds right. Another $5,000 went to dress up the Little League park where he had played so many games. Seems like he paid off the MORTAGE on his parents' home, which wasn't that much.
quote_letters: THATS SOUNDS RIGHT ANOTHER  WENT TO DRESS UP THE LITTLE LEAGUE PARK WHERE HE HAD PLAYED SO MANY GAMES SEEMS LIKE HE PAID OFF THE MORTAGE ON HIS PARENTS HOME WHICH WASNT THAT MUCH
